card_text: Pay 1000 LP; roll a six-sided die and apply the result.$N●1 or 2: Immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 monster.$N●3 or 4: You can Special Summon 1 monster from your GY.$N●5 or 6: You can Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher monster from your hand.$NYou can only activate 1 "Summon Dice" per turn.
